iceCreamFlavors.name: Hokey Pokey
iceCreamFlavors.description: Vanilla ice cream with small, solid lumps of honeycomb toffee.

iceCreamFlavors.name: Manuka Honey
iceCreamFlavors.description: Rich ice cream flavored with authentic Manuka honey known for its distinctive, earthy taste.

iceCreamFlavors.name: Feijoa Sorbet
iceCreamFlavors.description: Refreshing sorbet made from the unique, aromatic feijoa fruit, offering a sweet yet tart flavor.

iceCreamFlavors.name: Lemon & Paeroa
iceCreamFlavors.description: Ice cream flavored with New Zealand's famous soft drink, combining lemony freshness with a subtle ginger fizz.

iceCreamFlavors.name: Kiwi Fruit
iceCreamFlavors.description: Smooth, tangy kiwi fruit ice cream that captures the essence of freshly sliced kiwis.

iceCreamFlavors.name: Pavlova
iceCreamFlavors.description: Creamy ice cream with pieces of meringue and swirls of strawberry, mimicking the popular dessert.

iceCreamFlavors.name: Salted Caramel
iceCreamFlavors.description: Rich caramel ice cream with a hint of sea salt, offering a perfect blend of sweet and salty.

iceCreamFlavors.name: Black Doris Plum
iceCreamFlavors.description: Deep, rich plum ice cream made with Black Doris plums, offering a balance of sweet and tart flavors.

iceCreamFlavors.name: White Chocolate Raspberry
iceCreamFlavors.description: Creamy white chocolate ice cream swirled with sharp raspberry sauce.

iceCreamFlavors.name: Green Tea
iceCreamFlavors.description: Smooth and aromatic green tea ice cream, providing a refreshing and slightly bitter aftertaste.

iceCreamFlavors.name: Ginger Nut
iceCreamFlavors.description: A blend of spicy ginger ice cream with chunks of crunchy ginger nut biscuits.

iceCreamFlavors.name: Mango Lassi
iceCreamFlavors.description: Sweet and tangy mango ice cream inspired by the popular Indian yogurt drink.

iceCreamFlavors.name: Butterscotch Swirl
iceCreamFlavors.description: Smooth vanilla ice cream with thick, gooey butterscotch swirls.

iceCreamFlavors.name: Lavender Honey
iceCreamFlavors.description: Floral lavender ice cream sweetened with a touch of honey, offering a soothing taste experience.

iceCreamFlavors.name: Peppermint Chocolate Chip
iceCreamFlavors.description: Fresh peppermint ice cream dotted with rich chocolate chips.
